name: wontfix
description: This will not be worked on

name: duplicate
description: Already exists

name: feature
description: Contains a new feature or request

name: help wanted
description: Needs extra attention

name: docs
description: Contains improvements or additions to documentation

name: bug
description: Issue for a bug

name: fix
description: Contains a fix for a bug

name: needs triage
description: Needs to be triaged

name: stale
description: Issue or PR is stale

name: build
description: Changes related to configuration files or project build

name: release
description: PR for a new release

name: CI/CD
description: Related to DevOps processes

name: dependencies
description: PR updates a dependency

name: test
description: PR contains changes related to test files

name: style
description: Contains changes related visual styling

name: refactor
description: Contains changes related to refactoring

name: priority: critical
description: Requires immediate attention and should be addressed as soon as possible.

name: priority: high
description: Requires prompt attention and should be addressed after critical issues.

name: priority: medium
description: Requires attention but can be addressed after high-priority issues.

name: priority: low
description: Requires attention, but can be addressed at a later time when higher priorities are resolved.
